instructions:
In a skillet break up sausage and cook with celery and onion until sausage is done and vegetables are
tender. Remove from heat and drain excess fat. Stir in bread cubes, apple, salt, rosemary and pepper.
Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon apple juice and toss.
Sprinkle pockets with salt and pepper, spoon in stuffing and skewer opening with toothpicks. Place
stuffed chops in a shallow baking pan, cover with foil and bake in a 350 degree oven for 45 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan combine cranberry- orange sauce, the 1/2 cup apple juice and cornstarch.
Cook and stir until bubbly. Cook and stir 2 minutes more.
Uncover and drain chops. Spoon sauce over chops and bake uncovered an additional 30 minutes. Spoon
remaining sauce over chops and serve.
name: Sausage-stuffed Pork Chops
